result.title: Life cycle perspectives and LCC for deep geothermal energy utilisation
result.description: Life cycle perspectives and LCC for deep geothermal energy utilisation at the three demonstrator sites. This report will compile publishable information for all three demonstrators, i.e. Reykjanes, Valence, and Vistrenque. The three background internal reports WD2.3-2.5 will be used to develop this deliverable. Third Party UoI will lead the the drafting work as part of GEORG's team effort. Parts of this work may as well result in published scientific papers, and may form basis for thesis work by graduate students.
